entries.message:
Event Type: Network Emergency

We are performing system changes in the Seoul location during the following emergency maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-05-03 18:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-05-03 22:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Seoul instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the emergency maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Emergency

We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Sydney location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
